title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog should be shown.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 
2. Try creating a new table group.
